targets.query:
from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BmsReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "BatteryReading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "BatteryVoltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "bmsReadings")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "CellVoltageHigh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 4s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
